text: Ironichno, vony rozpalysya u sekty tilʹky pislya znannya prybuly yim, zavdyaky revnoshcham ta oburennyu sered sebe. Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya predetermined rishennya z vashoho Lorda respite yim fora vyznacheni tymchasovi, vony by sudylysʹ nehayno. Diysno, piznishi heneratsiyi khto uspadkuvav svyate pysannya ye povnyy sumniviv
